56.eng-name: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik:Once there was a feeling of fright in Medina, so the Prophet (ﷺ) borrowed a horse belonging to us called Mandub (and he rode away on it). (When the Prophet (ﷺ) returned) he said, "I have not seen anything of fright and I found it (i.e. this horse) very fast

chapter.eng-name: To name a horse and a donkey
